dct:title.value: Stability of limonin from lime seeds

bibo:abstract.value: Limonin was isolated and purified from lemon seeds. The effects of temperature and pH on stability of limonin were studied. Limonin had a reaction rate of an apparent first order type. It was most stable in pH 5 at 45°C. The solid limonin had a first order reaction of decomposition with the reaction rate constant of 1.58×10-3 day-1 at 45°C.
